member.name: M:CyberPet.Cyberpet.Punish
member.summary: Punishes the pet, causing injury.

member.name: M:CyberPet.Module1.workcheck
member.summary: Checks for a level up in work

member.name: M:CyberPet.Module1.Feed
member.summary: Gives the cyberpet food

member.name: M:CyberPet.Module1.UseDrink
member.summary: gives the cyberpet drink

member.name: M:CyberPet.Module1.UseBoost
member.summary: Gives the cyberpet an energy boost

member.name: M:CyberPet.Module1.UseBandage
member.summary: Gives the pet a bandage, healing injury

member.name: M:CyberPet.Module1.Annoy
member.summary: Produces a random speech-synthesised string from a selection

member.name: M:CyberPet.Module1.ToiletCheck
member.summary: Checks the need for toilet

member.name: M:CyberPet.Module1.SleepCheck
member.summary: Checks whether the pet is asleep and regaining energy

member.name: M:CyberPet.Module1.Karmaupdate
member.summary: Adds one to the karma if the buffer is at 1

member.name: M:CyberPet.Module1.updatecash
member.summary: Sets all cash labels to display up to date

member.name: M:CyberPet.Module1.karmacheck
member.summary: Changes the colour of the karmabar to suit the karma level

member.name: M:CyberPet.Module1.injurycheck
member.summary: Sets health value based on injury

member.name: M:CyberPet.Module1.HealthCheck
member.summary: Checks whether the health has hit 0 or not

member.name: M:CyberPet.Module1.CheckBodyType
member.summary: Updates the colour of the pet, and whether it is awake or not

member.name: M:CyberPet.Module1.newgame
member.summary: Starts a new game

member.name: M:CyberPet.Module1.pausegame
member.summary: Pauses the game

member.name: M:CyberPet.Module1.checkbars
member.summary: Runs subroutines as above

member.name: M:CyberPet.Module1.Backgroundcheck
member.summary: Sets the background of the settings form

member.name: M:CyberPet.Module1.play
member.summary: "plays" with the cyberpet, increasing karma and decreasing energy

member.name: M:CyberPet.Module1.Say(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Allows speech synthesis
